title: Join the Hunt of the Blood Moon

replies.body: blood moon kindred pleeeeeaaase {{champion:203}}
If they made a blood moon kindred it should look like San (Lamb) and Moro (Wolf) from princess Mononoke {{champion:203}} that would be the perfect skin for kindred
I'm still mad that this isn't a thing... This is a perfect idea for Kindred's character.

I think a Blood Moon {{champion:110}} would be pretty appropriate. Instead of Corruption, he could be a vengeful Blood Moon spirit.

A Blood Moon {{champion:103}} as a partner/side kick would also be pretty cool, but then again I just want Ahri to have a Blood Moon skin too. Her tails could be a mixture of black and red and she could have a cool bone mask like most spirits only this time it being fox-like. Her orb could be a floating crimson moon.

As you can tell, I really, really want this.

Nah dude the mask should be like a traditional [Kitsune mask](http://imgs.inkfrog.com/pix/wuss430/3064_(1).JPG). It'd fit better. 

Though I really don't like Ahri as a character.
You raise a good point.
Blood moon Diana would be awesome. Since she has moon powers
Blood moon Diana is a thing now
Id go for blood moon Nami! {{champion:267}}
how about a royal rumble kind of a game mode :D every man for himself..no teams!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
And then people are complaining urf are guaranteed wins with some picks... In a free-for all game play for league, either pick Rengar or Riven and there we go

None of the games can be 100% balanced..be it LoL or any other game.. If its every man for himself..we have the choice to focus one guy first if he picks an OP champ :D so no one is your ally or your enemy..focus that {{champion:55}}  first then fight amongst yourself..maybe..just thinking out loud!
I can't get that kind of teamwork in a ranked game.
Illaoi on this game mode.... ;-;
blood moon Riven {{champion:92}}  or Talon{{champion:91}}  or Katarina{{champion:55}} .  These champs would look awesome with blood moon skins.  :)

When will we get to see the splash art? I personally already saw TF and Diana, both of which are INCREDIBLE... I'm just so excited for Jhin.

I'd have to agree. Why hasn't Riot implemented this skin on Kindred. It would go wonderfully with her lore. Any insight in regards to this?

Also, @Zwill, it was AWESOME seeing you in NYC. Thanks for the awesome conversation and thanks for attending the NYCLoL after party! Keep rocking!
